{{Description|Enrich your adventures with various in-game items through our offer for Prime members only.}}
{{Description|To add excitement to our ongoing campaign on Prime Gaming, we're announcing that travellers who participate in the campaign may receive Wings of the Starlit Feast as a special reward celebrating the collaboration.<br />Between December 2022 and May 2023, Prime Gaming members can claim a Genshin Impact Bundle code for free on Prime Gaming and redeem various in-game items as the Bundle updates every three weeks. If you redeemed 4 or more drops during the entire campaign, you'll receive the Wings of the Starlit Feast via in-game mail within 30 working days after the end of all 8 drops. One account can receive no more than one Wings of the Starlit Feast.<br />Please note that the Genshin Impact Prime Gaming Bundles are only available in selected regions.}}
'''Prime Gaming''' is an event where members of Amazon Prime can obtain [[Promotional Codes|codes]] to claim rewards from drops.

==Duration==
2022-12-14 – 2023-06-32

==Requirements==
*Amazon Prime membership
*[[Adventure Rank]] 2 to be able to claim the reward from your in-game inbox, but can already be redeemed at Adventure Rank 1.

==Frequently Asked Questions==
The following section is a transcription of the Prime Gaming page's Frequently Asked Questions section.
# '''Does my code from Prime Gaming expire?'''
#* Yes, the codes do expire after the end date of the drop through which it was claimed：
#** Redemption Code from drop #1 expires on 4 Jan 2022 - 23:59 (UTC+8)
#** Redemption Code from drop #2 expires on 25 Jan 2023 - 23:59 (UTC+8)
#** Redemption Code from drop #3 expires on 15 Feb 2023 - 23:59 (UTC+8)
#** Redemption Code from drop #4 expires on 8 Mar 2023 - 23:59 (UTC+8)
#**Redemption Code from drop #5 expires on 29 Mar 2023 - 23:59 (UTC+8)
#**Redemption Code from drop #6 expires on 19 Apr 2023 - 23:59 (UTC+8)
#**Redemption Code from drop #7 expires on 10 May 2023 - 23:59 (UTC+8)
#**Redemption Code from drop #8 expires on 31 May 2023 - 23:59 (UTC+8)
# '''Can I claim previous drops in this campaign?'''
#* You can only claim the currently available drop, once the drop period ends, you can't claim the redemption code anymore.
# '''How will I receive the Wings of the Starlit Feast?'''
#* If you redeemed 4 or more drops during the entire campaign, you'll receive the Wings of the Starlit Feast via in-game mail within 30 working days after the end of all 8 drops. Only claiming the drop's code doesn't count, the drop's code needs to be redeemed.
# '''How do I access my content?'''
## Launch Genshin Impact, login, and enter the game’s world.
## Open the Paimon menu in the upper left corner.
## Open the settings menu by clicking the gear icon
## In the setting’s menu enter '''Account, Redeem Code, Exchange'''.
## After redeeming a code, you will receive the redeemed items via in-game mail.
#* How to redeem your in-game content through Genshin Impact’s website:
## Go to Genshin Impact’s official website [https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/ here]
## Click the '''Redeem Code''' tab
## Login using your HoYoverse Account or Facebook/Twitter account
## Follow the instructions presented on screen
## After redeeming a code, you will receive the redeemed items via in-game mail.
# '''What happens to my content if I no longer have a Prime membership or my free trial expires?'''
#* Once you redeem your content, all content that is delivered to your game is yours to keep, subject to any Genshin Impact rules or policies that apply to the content.
# '''I collected the content but I don't see it in the game. What do I do?'''
#* After redeeming a code, you will receive the redeemed items via in-game mail, please make sure to check the in-game mail.
# '''I received an error that my Amazon account has already claimed this content. What do I do?'''
#* After redeeming a code, you will receive the redeemed items via in-game mail, please make sure to check the in-game mail.
# '''Where can I get this game?'''
#* Genshin Impact is available on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Mobile. It can be found at the following stores:
#** [https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/Genshin Impact's Official Website]
#** [https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1517783697 The App Store on iOS & iPadOS]
#** [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.miHoYo.GenshinImpact Google Play Store]
#** [https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/genshin-impact/ Sony PlayStation Store]
#** [https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/genshin-impact Epic Games Store]
#** 
# '''On which of the game's servers will this content be available?'''
#* This content will only be available on America, Europe, Asia, and TW, HK, MO servers.  This content will NOT be available on Celestia and Irminsul servers.
# '''Can I get this content on every platform I play on?'''
#* Yes. Content is available across all platforms where you’ve enabled cross play with the same account in which you've redeemed the in-game content.
# '''What if I have an issue that isn't addressed above?'''
#* If you are having trouble with your Amazon Prime membership, please reference [https://www.amazongames.com/en-us/support/prime-gaming '''Prime Gaming Support''']<br />For issues with your game account, please reference [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/202963 Genshin Impact Support]
